"Job number one is showing this new phone to people," he said. What we find is that once people see the phone, they fall in love with it. Although Allen Iverson 's two free throws with 17.1 seconds left were the difference in a 101-100 victory, Theo Ratliff 's season-high 25 points and George Lynch's basket over 7-foot-6 Shawn Bradley were pivotal, too. Theo Ratliff was demanding the ball and we had to get it to him the way he was putting it in the hole, 76ers guard Aaron McKie said. a lot to overcome. A poll taken for The Hollywood Reporter shows that "Big Ben Roethlisberger " is the most disliked player in today's game. The good news for him: Despite what Sports Illustrated described as repulsive behavior, the ultimate expression of athletic entitlement run amok, Ben Roethlisberger is not the most disliked player in the league.
